content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at position (-1.0, -1.0). However, it is currently out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt.
# To start smelting the iron ore into iron plates, I need to add fuel to the furnace. 

# Since I have wood in my inventory, I can use it as fuel. I will add some wood to the stone furnace to provide it with fuel.
add_fuel(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=5)  # Using 5 wood as fuel.

# Now, I will add the iron ore to the furnace for smelting.
add_ingredient(Prototype.StoneFurnace, 'iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Adding all 10 iron ore for smelting.

# After adding the fuel and ingredients, I will check the status of the furnace and the inventory.
print(f"Entities after adding fuel and ingredients: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory after smelting preparation: {inspect_inventory()}")
